name: Mage War (Cedric Quilal-lan)
description:
Game About:
After Sylvanna ( based on my old game )has been recruited, she is brought here to be trained along with other Rangers Guild,
Combine Spells to outplay the opponents, the last Mage standing Wins.
this game, is made for WannaXYam Jam:
hosted by Wannabi Manisha and Sam Yam

Theme:
The Theme is "Combination" in my game, the spells used can be combined.

Controls:
                                                            Practice
Player 1: Arrows for Movement / ZXCVB for Spells / Spacebar for Jump
                                                            2 Player
Player 1: WASD for Movement / ZXCVB for Spells / Q for Jump
Player 2: Arrows for Movement / YUIOP for Spells / L for Jump

DevNote:
If you like this game, check my Youtube to see more!!!
help me reach 100 sub this year XD
